Cutie sticks his arm in front of his gun and it takes
all the shots.

Cutie: Just protecting my assets. Now tell me why you
want me dead. I had no plans of aggresion towards
Predicons when I came here and I still don't. I intend
to leave this planet as soon as I find the fountain of
youth.

He fires 7 shots at this bots eyes. Then 1 directly
above them.
